Topic Summary: Appeal against a decision by the Revenue Commissioners refusing a claim for a refund of Value Added Tax.
Tax Legislation: Article 132(1)(i) Council Directive 2006/112/EC of 28 November 2006,  Section 3 of the VATCA2010, Schedule 1 – Exempt Activities (as inserted by section 54(b)(i) and (ii) of the Finance Act 2015).
